attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The immigration system in this country is not easy  for skilled workers.

After passing from university , foreign student in UK get 1 year work permit visa(International Graduates Scheme ).But, this one year period does not counted towards settlement.This rule is disappointg for a prospective immigrant.

UK should encouraging skilled people with talent from rest of the world.
